Module Niagara
Header /Engine/Plugins/FX/Niagara/Source/Niagara/Public/NiagaraVolumeRendererProperties.h
Include #include "NiagaraVolumeRendererProperties.h"

Syntax

UCLASS (EditInlineNew, MinimalAPI, Meta=(DisplayName="Volume Renderer"))  
class UNiagaraVolumeRendererProperties : public UNiagaraRendererProperties

Variables

  Type Name Description
float LightingDownsampleFactor  
TObjectPtr< UMaterialInterface > Material What material to use for the volume.
FNiagaraParameterBinding MaterialParameterBinding Binding to material.
FNiagaraRendererMaterialParameters MaterialParameters If this array has entries, we will create a MaterialInstanceDynamic per Emitter instance from Material and set the Material parameters using the Niagara simulation variables listed.
TObjectPtr< UMaterialInstanceConstant > MICMaterial  
FNiagaraVariableAttributeBinding PositionBinding Position binding for the center of the volume.
FNiagaraDataSetAccessor< FNiagaraPosition > PositionDataSetAccessor  
int32 RendererVisibility If a render visibility tag is present, particles whose tag matches this value will be visible in this renderer.
FNiagaraDataSetAccessor< int32 > RendererVisibilityTagAccessor  
FNiagaraVariableAttributeBinding RendererVisibilityTagBinding Visibility tag binding, when valid the returned values is compared with RendererVisibility.
FNiagaraVariableAttributeBinding RotationBinding Rotation binding for the volume.
FNiagaraDataSetAccessor< FQuat4f > RotationDataSetAccessor  
FNiagaraVariableAttributeBinding ScaleBinding Scale binding for the volume.
FNiagaraDataSetAccessor< FVector3f > ScaleDataSetAccessor  
float ShadowBiasFactor  
float ShadowStepFactor  
ENiagaraRendererSourceDataMode SourceMode Whether or not to draw a single element for the Emitter or to draw the particles.
float StepFactor  
FNiagaraDataSetAccessor< int32 > VolumeResolutionMaxAxisAccessor  
FNiagaraVariableAttributeBinding VolumeResolutionMaxAxisBinding  
FNiagaraDataSetAccessor< FVector3f > VolumeWorldSpaceSizeAccessor  
FNiagaraVariableAttributeBinding VolumeWorldSpaceSizeBinding
